meanings.definition: A person who works on or operates a raft.
meanings.sent1: The raftsmen skillfully navigated the river.
meanings.sent2: The group of raftsmen guided the raft downstream.
meanings.sent3: The raftsmen joked about having a 'raft race' with canoes.
meanings.sent4: The raftsmen were the captains of their wooden ships.
meanings.sent5: The image of the raftsmen steering through the rapids stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: We saw a team of raftsmen working together on the river.
meanings.sent2: The raftsmen were skilled in handling different types of rafts.
meanings.sent3: The raftsmen formed a strong bond during their rafting expeditions.
meanings.sent4: The raftsmen stood out among the other river workers.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the raftsmen echoed along the riverbanks.
